body.p: To the Hon B Magoffin Governor of the State of Kentucky.

Peter Clark states that Judgment has been rendered against him at the present term of the Christian Circuit court for one hundred Dollars on a forfeited recognizance, he having failed to appear and answer to a presentment of said court.

He states that in consequence of bad health that haveing been for some time afflicted with Chills he failed to reach the court house in time to answer to his case which was called early in the morning & that he lived about ten miles from Hopkinsville He prays to have the same remitted, being poor he is unable to pay it without a sacrifice of his little property
The undersigned citizens of Christian County concur in recommending the Case of Peter Clark to the favourable consideration of the Governer.
